game.name: Inverted Dreams
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This dream driven psychological exploration game guides you through shifting landscapes shaped by buried fears, fractured memories and unsettling truths. As the world bends, every shadow becomes a clue, and every step pulls you deeper into the subconscious you’ve tried to forget.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This dream driven psychological exploration game guides you through shifting landscapes shaped by buried fears, fractured memories and unsettling truths. As the world bends, every shadow becomes a clue, and every step pulls you deeper into the subconscious you’ve tried to forget.
